code: @Test public void testCoAPConsumerWithDefaultPort() throws Exception {     CoapClient client = createClient("/greeting", CoAPComponent.DEFAULT_PORT).     CoapResponse response = client.get().     assertEquals("Hello World", response.getResponseText()). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("coap:localhost/greeting").setBody(constant("Hello World")). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("coap:localhost/greeting").setBody(constant("Hello World")).         }     }. }
